targetAudience: beginners to intermediate-level practitioners, mainly adults aged 25–45, including working professionals, students, and those seeking stress relief and better sleep
mainGoal: provide guided meditation resources, offer online sessions, and build a peaceful community, while also helping generate leads and promote our meditation services
colorScheme: soft and calming color scheme—pastel tones like light lavender, soft blue, sage green, and warm beige

branding.logo: minimalist lotus flower, mandala, or a person in a meditative pose
